meanings.definition: One of the short hairs that grow along the edges of the eyelids.
meanings.sent1: Her eyelash fluttered as she blinked.
meanings.sent2: She carefully applied mascara to her eyelash.
meanings.sent3: The tiny spider used the eyelash as a tightrope.
meanings.sent4: Her eyelash was like a delicate feather framing her eye.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight caught her eyelash, making it sparkle like a diamond.

meanings.definition: A single hair of the eyelashes.
meanings.sent1: He found an eyelash on his cheek.
meanings.sent2: She wished on an eyelash for good luck.
meanings.sent3: The eyelash fell gracefully onto the book she was reading.
meanings.sent4: The eyelash danced in the breeze like a tiny ribbon.
meanings.sent5: The eyelash was so fine, it was almost invisible to the naked eye.
